GK21ttrkhy1u:3: tatra ye karmakārās sthapatyādayaḥ ! madhyāhnavelāyām āhāranimittaṃ bhojanamaṇḍapam anupraviṣṭāḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:7: tatra kadācid vānarayūtho giriśikharād avatīrya svecchayā taruśikharaprāsādaśṛṅgadārunicayeṣu prakrīḍitum ārabdhaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:8: ekas tu tatrāsannavināśaś cāpalād upaviśya stambhe yantracāram uddiśyedam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:11: sthānāc calite kīle yad vṛttam ! tad anākhyeyam ! evam eva bhavatā
GK21ttrkhy1u:14: asti kaścid gomāyur āhāravicchedāt kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭha itaś ca itaḥ paribhramann ubhayasainasyāyodhanabhūmim apaśyat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:16: tadbhayasaṃkṣubhitahṛdayaḥ kim idam ! vinaṣṭo 'smi ! kasyāyaṃ śabdaḥ ! kva vā kīdṛśo vaiṣa śabda iti ! cintayatā dṛṣṭā giriśikharākārā bherī |
GK21ttrkhy1u:18: kim ayaṃ śabdo 'syās svābhāvikaḥ ! uta paraprerita iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:19: atha sā yadā vāyupreritair vṛkṣāgrais spṛśyate ! tadā śabdaṃ karoti !
GK21ttrkhy1u:21: sa tu tasyās sārāsāratāṃ jñātuṃ saṃnikarṣam upaśliṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:22: svayaṃ ca kautukād ubhayor mukhayor atāḍayat ! acintayac ca|
GK21ttrkhy1u:25: paruṣatvāc ca carmaṇaḥ kathamapi na daṃṣṭrābhaṅgam avāptavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:28: ity adhyavasya bheryā mukhaṃ vidāryāntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:33: asti kasmiṃścit pradeśe parivrāḍ devaśarmā nāma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:36: sa ca na kasyacid api viśvāsaṃ yāti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:37: atha kadācid āṣāḍhabhūtir nāma paravittāpahṛt katham iyam arthamātrāsya mayā parihartavyeti vitarkyāvalaganarūpeṇa upagamya tatkālena ca viśvāsam anayat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:38: atha kadācid asau parivrājakas tīrthayātrāprasaṅge tena āṣāḍhabhūtinā saha gantum ārabdhaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:39: tatra ca kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe nadītīre mātrāntika āṣāḍhabhūtim avasthāpyaikāntam udakagrahaṇārthaṃ gataḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:41: anavaratayuddhaśaktisampannayoś ca tayoś śṛṅgapañjarāntarodbhūtasṛg bahu bhūmau nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā āśāpratibaddhacittaḥ piśitalobhatayā gomāyus tajjighṛkṣus sampīḍitodghātāt sadyaḥ pañcatvam agamat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:44: kṛtaśaucaś cāgatas tam uddeśam āṣāḍhabhūmim api gṛhītārthamātrāsāram apakrāntaṃ nāpaśyad devaśarmā
GK21ttrkhy1u:50: athāsau kapālaśakalagranthikāvaśeṣaḥ kañcid grāmam astaṃ gacchati ravau praviṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:51: praviśann ekāntavāsinaṃ tantravāyam apaśyat ! āvāsakaṃ ca prārthitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:52: tenāpi tasyātmīyagṛhaikadeśe sthānaṃ nirdiśya bhāryā abhihitā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:53: yāvad ahaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā suhṛtsameto madhupānaṃ krtvā āgacchāmi ! tāvad apramattayā gṛhe tvayā bhāvyam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:55: atha tasya bhāryā puṃścalī dūtikāsañcoditā śarīrasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā paricitasakāśaṃ gantum ārabdhā
GK21ttrkhy1u:56: abhimukhaś cāsyā bhartā madavilopāsamāptākṣaravacanaḥ pariskhalitagatir avasrastavāsās samāyātaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:57: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pratyutpannamatiḥ kauśalād ākalpam apanīya pūrvaprakṛtam eva veṣam āsthāya pādaśaucaśayanādyārambham akarot |
GK21ttrkhy1u:58: kaulikas tu gṛhaṃ praviśya nidrāvaśam agamat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:60: puṃścali ! tvadgatam apacāraṃ suhṛdo me varṇayanti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:63: asāv api nirmaryādā prativacanaṃ dātum ārabdhā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:64: punar api cāsau pratibuddhas tāṃ madhyastūṇāyāṃ rajjvā supratibaddhāṃ kṛtvā prasuptaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:66: sā tūtpannapratibhā dūtikām ātmīyadarśanasaṃvidhānena baddhvā kāmukasakāśaṃ yayau |
GK21ttrkhy1u:67: asāv api pratibuddhas tathaiva tām ākroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:68: dūtikā tu śaṅkitahṛdayānucitavākyodāharaṇabhītā na kiñcid uktavatī |
GK21ttrkhy1u:69: tantravāyas tu śāṭhyād iyaṃ na kiñcin mamottaraṃ prayacchati ity utthāya tasyās tīkṣṇaśastreṇa nāsikāṃ chittvābravīt |
GK21ttrkhy1u:73: āgatā ca sā tantravāyī dūtikām apṛcchat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:77: dūtikā tu kṛtanigrahā nāsikāṃ darśayantī sāmarṣam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:83: kaulikas tu yathāpūrvam eva pratibuddhas tām ākrośat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:84: asāv api duṣṭā bahu dhṛṣṭaram āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:88: yathāhaṃ kaumāraṃ bhartāraṃ muktvā nānyaṃ parapuruṣaṃ manasāpi vedmi ! tathā mamānena satyenāvyaṅgyaṃ mukham astv iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:89: athāsau mūrkhaḥ kṛtakavacanavyāmohitacittaḥ prajvālyolkām avyaṅgamukhīṃ jāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā protphullanayanaḥ paricumbya hṛṣṭamanā bandhavād avamucya pīḍitaṃ ca pariṣvajya śayyām āropitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:90: parivrājakas tv ādita evārabhya yathāvṛttam artham abhijñātavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:93: atha tasyā bhartā nāpito rājakulāt pratyūṣasy āgatya tāṃ bhāryām āha
GK21ttrkhy1u:96: sā ca duṣṭābhyantarasthaiva kṣuram eva prāhiṇot |
GK21ttrkhy1u:97: sa ca samastakṣurabhāṇḍāsamarpaṇāt krodhāviṣṭacitto nāpitas tam eva tasyāḥ kṣuraṃ pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot |
GK21ttrkhy1u:98: athāsāv ārtaravam ucchaiḥ kṛtvā pāṇinā nāsāpuṭaṃ pramṛjya asṛkpātasametāṃ nāsikāṃ kṣitau prakṣipyābravīt
GK21ttrkhy1u:101: tathābhyāgatai rājapuruṣaiḥ pratyakṣadarśanāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ kīlapārṣṇilaguḍair atīva hataṃ paścād bāhubandhaś ca tayā saha dharmasthānam upanīto nāpitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:102: pṛcchyamānaś cādhikṛtaiḥ kim idaṃ mahad viśasanaṃ svadāreṣu tvayā kṛtam iti yadā bahuśa ucyamāno nottaraṃ prayacchati ! tadā dharmādhikṛtāś śūle 'vataṃsyatām ity ājñāpitavantaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:103: niṣpāpaṃ ca parivrāṭ cchūlasthānaṃ nīyamānaṃ nāpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sattvānukampayā copalabdhatattvārtho 'dhikaraṇam upagamya dharmasthānādhikṛtān abravīt |
GK21ttrkhy1u:110: asti kasmiṃścit pradeśe vṛkṣaḥ ! tasmiṃś ca vāyasau dampatī prativasatas sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:111: tayos tu prasavakāle tadvṛkṣavivarānusāry- asañjātakriyāṇy evāpatyāni kṛṣṇasarpo bhakṣayati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:112: atha tenāpakāranirvedanād anyavṛkṣamūlavāsinaṃ priyasuhṛdaṃ gomāyum apṛcchyata ! yathā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:113: bhadra ! kim evaṃ gate prāptakālaṃ bhavān manyate |
GK21ttrkhy1u:122: asti ! kaścid bako vṛddhabhāvāt sukhopāyāṃ vṛttim ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ kasmiṃścit saraḥpradeśe 'dhṛtiparītam iva ātmano rūpaṃ pradarśayann avasthitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:124: māma ! kim adyāhārakṛtyaṃ nānuṣṭhīyate yathā pureti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:128: mayā yuṣmān āsādya pūrvaṃ prāṇarakṣā kṛtā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:138: tān āsādya punar āgamiṣyāma iti kathayām āsuḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:146: kintv asmād dhradād anyaṃ jalāśayaṃ yuṣmān saṅkrāmayiṣyāmi
GK21ttrkhy1u:147: tatas tair viśvāsam upagatais tāta ! bhrātar ! mātula ! mātula ! māṃ naya ! māṃ naya ! prathamataraṃ nayasvety abhihitam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:148: asāv api duṣṭamatiḥ krameṇa nītvā kauśalād ajasraṃ tān bhakṣayan paraṃ paritoṣam upāgataḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:149: kulīrakas tu mṛtyubhayodvigno muhur muhus taṃ prārthitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:150: māma ! mām api tāvad arhasi mṛtyumukhāt paritrātum iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:154: tatas samutkṣipya viyat sarvāmbhassthānāni parihṛtyaikadeśe taptaśilāyām avatīrṇaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:156: nihatā anena durātmanā prajñāpūrvakaṃ te mīnāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:159: [ abhiyukto yadā paśyen na kāñcid gatim ātmanaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:160: yudhyamānas tadā prājño mriyeta ripuṇā saha ||61|| ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:181: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tenāntaḥpuraikadeśe dhautavastrayugalopari suvarṇasūtram uttamamaṇiviracitaṃ mahārhaṃ prakṣālya ceṭikayā sthāpitam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:182: tac cāvasthāpyānyayā saha kathāṃ kartum ārabdhā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:183: vāyasas tu tad gṛhītvā viyatā śanair ātmānaṃ darśayan svam ālayaṃ prati prāyāt |
GK21ttrkhy1u:184: athārakṣipuruṣaiḥ prāsamudgaratomarapāṇibhir mahatā javena gatvā vṛkṣo 'valokitaḥ ! yāvat tena tat svanīḍe sthāpitam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:185: tatraikenārohatā dṛṣṭam ! kṛṣṇabhujaṅgo vāyasapotān bhakṣayitvā nidrāvaśam agamat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:187: tat kṛtvā suvarṇasūtram ādāya gata iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:189: asti ! kasmiṃścid vanāntare mahān siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:191: atha te mṛgās sarvae evābhimukhāḥ praṇatacittā haritatṛṇāṅkuravaktradhāriṇo 'vanitalāsaktajānavas taṃ mṛgarājaṃ vijñāpayām āsuḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:192: bho mṛgarāja kim anena paralokaviruddhena svāmino nṛśaṃsena niṣkāraṇaṃ sarvamṛgotsādanakarmaṇā kṛtena |
GK21ttrkhy1u:193: vayaṃ tāvad vinaṣṭā eva ! tavāpy āhārasyābhāvaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:196: vayaṃ tu svāmina ekaikaṃ vanacaraṃ vāreṇa svajātisamutthaṃ preṣayāmaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:198: sa tu sarvamṛgājñāpito ruṣitamanāś cintayām āsa |
GK21ttrkhy1u:204: asāv api kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhaḥ krodhasaṃraktanayanas sphuradvadanadaśanasaṅgharṣadaṃṣṭrākarālo lāṅgūlāsphālanākārabhayakṛt tam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:215: katham anyo 'tra madbhujaparirakṣite vane siṃha iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:223: asāv api śaśo 'ntarlīnam avahasya bṛhaspatyuśanasor nītiśāstraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:224: pramāṇīkṛtya svārthasiddhaye vimalajalasaṃpannaṃ dvipuruṣaprāpyodakam iṣṭakācitaṃ mahāntaṃ kūpam adarśayat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:225: asāv apy ātmakāyapratibimbānabhijñatayā kumārgāpannacitto 'yam asau sapatna iti matvā sahasaiva
GK21ttrkhy1u:228: asti kasyacid rājñas sarvaguṇopetam ananyasadṛśaṃ śayanam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:229: tasmin pracchadapaṭaikadeśe mandavisarpiṇī nāma yūkā prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:230: atha tasmiṃṣ ṭiṇṭibho nāma matkuṇo vāyunā preritas sannipatitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:231: sa tu tac chayanam atisūkṣmottaracchadam ubhayopadhānaṃ jāhnavīpulinavipulaṃ paramamṛdu surabhi ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ paritoṣam upagataḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:232: tatsparśākṛṣṭamanā itaś cetaḥ paribhraman katham api tayā mandavisarpiṇyā sametaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:237: ārye ! mayā tāvad ihānekaprakārāṇi māṃsāny āsvāditāni brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭchūdrāntassthāni rudhirāṇi ca |
GK21ttrkhy1u:238: tāni tu rūkṣāṇi picchilāny atuṣṭikarāṇy amanojñāni |
GK21ttrkhy1u:239: yaḥ punar asya śayanasyādhiṣṭhātā ! tasya manoramam amṛtopamam
GK21ttrkhy1u:241: ajasraṃ bhiṣagbhiḥ prayatnād auṣadhādyupakramād vātapittaśleṣmanirodhād anāmayatayā snigdhapeśaladravais sakhaṇḍaguḍadāḍimatrikaṭukapaṭubhis sthalajajalajakhecarabalavatpradhānapiśitopabrṃhitair āhārair upacitaṃ rudhiraṃ rasāyanam iva manye |
GK21ttrkhy1u:242: tac ca surabhi puṣṭikaraṃ cecchāmy ahaṃ tvatprasādād āsvādayitum iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:247: sā tu dākṣiṇyāt tathā nāmeti pratipannā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:248: kintu naivākāle na cātimṛdubhāge tvayāsya prahartavyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:253: madhupānaśramāgatanidrasya rativilāsanirbharasuptasya ca śanair mṛdutayā bhavatā vicāraṇīyam
GK21ttrkhy1u:256: asāv api parthiva ulmukadagdha iva saṃlīnakukṣipradeśas sasambhramam utthāyāha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:258: atha matkuṇaś cakitatvād rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śayanād avatīrya anyad vivaram āśritaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:259: śayyāpālair api svāmyādeśāt sunipuṇam anviṣadbhir vastraṃ parivartayadbhir antarlīnā mandavisarpiṇī samāsāditā vyāpāditā ca |
GK21ttrkhy1u:261: asti kasmiṃścin nagarasamīpe sannikṛṣṭavivarābhyantaraśāyī jambukaś caṇḍaravo nāma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:262: sa kadācid āhāram anveṣamāṇaḥ kṣapām āsādya kṣutkṣāmagalas sammīlitalocanaḥ paribhraman nagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:263: tannagaravāsibhiś ca sārameyais tīkṣṇadaśanakoṭivilupyamānāvayavo bhayabhairavaphetkāraravapūritadigvivara itas tataḥ praskhalan palāyamānaḥ kasmiṃścid ajñānān nīlīkalaśe sannipatitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:266: athāsya taccharīraṃ nīlīrasarañjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā samīpavartinaḥ kroṣṭukagaṇāḥ ko 'yam iti bhayataraladṛśas sarvā diśaḥ pradudruvuḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:268: nūnam imāṃ svarūpavikṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvaite palāyantae iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:271: aham ākhaṇḍalājñayā sakalaśvāpadakulapālanakṣamaḥ kṣititalam āgata iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:272: atha tadvacanam ākarṇya siṃhavyāghracitrakavānaraśaśahariṇavṛṣadaṃśajambukā dayaś śvāpadagaṇās taṃ praṇemuḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:273: pratidinaṃ ca kesarikarajakuliśadāritamattebhapiśitair āpūryamāṇakukṣiḥ kakṣam iva taṃ jambukapūgaṃ bahiḥ kṛtvā siṃhavyāghrādīn āsannavartinaś cakāra |
GK21ttrkhy1u:274: ekadā tv asau vividhapiśitanāśitakṣud dikṣu sthitānāṃ kroṣṭukānāṃ krośatāṃ ninādaṃ śrutvā tvaritataram uccair ninanāda
GK21ttrkhy1u:275: atas te siṃhādayas trapayā bhūbhāgadṛṣṭibhājaḥ kaṣṭam aho !
GK21ttrkhy1u:276: vañcitās smaḥ ! kroṣṭāyam ity avadhārya ruṣā taṃ paruṣagiraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:278: [1,9 Kamel, Löwe, Panther, Krähe und Schakal]
GK21ttrkhy1u:279: asti ! kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe madotkaṭo nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:281: atha tair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭas sārthavāhaparibhraṣṭa uṣṭraḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:282: taṃ cājñātapūrvarūpaṃ hāsyajananaṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhaḥ pṛṣṭavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:283: idam apūrvaṃ sattvam iha vane pṛcchyatām |
GK21ttrkhy1u:288: tenāpi yathāvṛttam ātmano viyogas sārthavāhāt samākhyātaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:290: evaṃ ca vartamāne kadācit siṃho vanyagajayuddharadanakṣataśarīro guhāvāsī saṃvṛttaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:291: pañcaṣaḍdivasātikrānte ca kāle sarvae eva tae āhāravaikalyād ātyayikam āpatitāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:293: aham anayā rujā na kṣamaḥ pūrvavad āhāraṃ bhavatām utpādayitum |
GK21ttrkhy1u:294: te yūyam ātmārthe 'pi tāvad abhyudgamaṃ kuruta |
GK21ttrkhy1u:298: sādhv anujīvivṛttaṃ madupari bhaktiś ca bhavatām |
GK21ttrkhy1u:302: yadā ca na kiñcid ūcuḥ ! tadā tenābhihitāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:307: evam uktvā te 'py utthāya saha krathanakena vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:310: vināśitā vayam anena svāminā svādhīne 'py arthe |
GK21ttrkhy1u:323: tiṣṭhata yūyaṃ yāvad aham evaitad arthaṃ sampratipādayiṣyāmi |
GK21ttrkhy1u:328: yasya cakṣur balaṃ vā syāt ! so 'nviṣyatu |
GK21ttrkhy1u:329: vayaṃ tu sarvae evāhāravaikalyād andhāḥ parikṣīṇaśaktayaś
GK21ttrkhy1u:342: [ na gopradānaṃ na mahīpradānaṃ na cānnadānaṃ hi tathā pradhānam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:346: etad anyad api pradhānaṃ maharṣivacanam ! yathā śreyasām arthe
GK21ttrkhy1u:349: [ tyajed ekaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet |
GK21ttrkhy1u:357: ayaṃ tāvad etadavasthaṃ svāminam asmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā svayam ātmānam anyapuṣṭyarthaṃ svargagamanāya sattvahitāya nivedayati |
GK21ttrkhy1u:358: evam abhihitavati vāyase siṃho matibhramam ivārpito na kiñcid apy udāhṛtavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:359: asāv api punas tatsakāśaṃ gatvā kṛtakavacanaiḥ pratyekaṃ vijñāpitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:360: siṃhāntikaṃ gatair yuṣmābhir evaṃ vaktavyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:361: tataḥ kṛtasaṃvidas saha krathanakena siṃhasakāśaṃ gatāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:366: na yuṣmaccharīropabhoge kṛte 'py asmākaṃ kiñcit tṛptikāraṇaṃ bhavati |
GK21ttrkhy1u:372: ābhyāṃ mama viśiṣṭataraṃ śarīram idam upayujyatām iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:377: tad aham apy evam eva bravīmi |
GK21ttrkhy1u:381: evam abhivadann eva dvīpigomāyubhyāṃ vidāritobhayakukṣis sadyaḥ pañcatvam upagato bhakṣitaś ceti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:393: bhadre ! na śakto mahodadhir mayā sārdham īdṛśaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:399: [ duḥkham ātmā paricchettum evaṃ yogyo na veti vā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:400: evaṃvid yasya vijñānaṃ saphalās tasya buddhayaḥ ||126|| ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:403: sa kūrma iva durbuddhiḥ kāṣṭhād bhraṣṭo vinaśyati ||127|| ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:408: asti ! kasmiṃścit sarasi kambugrīvo nāma kacchapaḥ prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:414: kiṃ punaś ciroṣitaṃ priyamitraṃ kambugrīvam āmantrayāvahe |
GK21ttrkhy1u:417: yadi tu sneho 'sti ! tato mām apy asmān mṛtyumukhāt trātum arhathaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:418: yatkāraṇam ! yuvayos tāvad āhāravaikalyaṃ kevalam asmin svalpodake sarasi ! mamātra tu maraṇam eva |
GK21ttrkhy1u:425: tvayā punaś cāpalān na kiñcid vaktavyam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:426: imāṃ tu yaṣṭiṃ madhye daśanair āpīḍaya |
GK21ttrkhy1u:427: evam anayaivoddhṛtya ṣaṣṭimātrāṇi yojanāni mahat saro bhavantaṃ nayāvaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:429: evaṃ ca niṣpanne tajjalāśayasannikṛṣṭanagarasyopariṣṭān nīyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā ! kim idaṃ śakaṭacakrapramāṇaṃ viyatā nīyatae iti janas sakalakalas samvṛttaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:430: tac ca śrutvāsannavināśaḥ kacchapo yaṣṭiṃ tyaktvābhihitavān
GK21ttrkhy1u:432: cāpalād eṣa lokaḥ pralapati ! iti bruvan vacanasamakālam evāśrayāt paribhraṣṭo bhūmau nipatitaḥ ! māṃsārthinā ca lokena
GK21ttrkhy1u:433: pātasamakālam eva tīkṣṇaśastraiḥ khaṇḍaśo vibhakta iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:435: asti ! kasmiṃścin mahāhrade mahākāyās trayo matsyāḥ prativasanti
GK21ttrkhy1u:438: tatrānāgatavidhātrā tadudakāntargatena kadācit tatsamīpe matsyabandhānām atikrāmatāṃ vacanaṃ śrutam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:443: tad ahaṃ pratyutpannamatiṃ yadbhaviṣyaṃ ca gṛhītvānyam acchinnasrotaskaṃ hradaṃ saṃśrayāmīti
GK21ttrkhy1u:445: tatra pratyutpannamatir matinivārito 'bhayacittaḥ katham api pramādān nānuyātaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:446: yadbhaviṣyas tv āsannavināśas tadvacanam anādṛtya nirārambha eva āsīt |
GK21ttrkhy1u:447: anyedyuś cāpayāte 'nāgatavidhātari matsyabandhair antassroto nirudhya prakṣiptaṃ samvartajālam
GK21ttrkhy1u:448: apakṛṣṭe ca jāle tasmin hrade nāpy ekataro 'vaśiṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:449: evaṃ gate pratyutpannamatir mṛtarūpaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ jalasya upari darśitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:450: tair api svayam eva mṛto mahāmatsya iti kṛtvā parisrotasi sthāpitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:452: yadbhaviṣyas tv anekalaguḍaprahārajarjaritaśarīraḥ pañcatvam upanīta iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:455: atha kadācit prasūtāyāṃ ṭīṭibhyāṃ tadbhartṛjijñāsayā samudreṇa apahṛtās te 'ṇḍakāḥ ! paśyāmi tāvat ! ayaṃ kim ārambhatae iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:456: atha ṭīṭibhī śūnyam apatyasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramāvignahṛdayā bhartāram āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:459: mamāpi tāvat ! bhadre ! dṛśyatāṃ sāmarthyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:460: tatas tena pakṣisamājaṃ kṛtvā niveditaṃ tadapatyaharaṇajaṃ duḥkham |
GK21ttrkhy1u:464: sarvae eva vayam ākrandena garutmantam udvejayāmaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:467: asāv api devāsuraraṇanimittam āhūto viṣṇunā garuḍas tat svayūthyavyasanaṃ dṛṣṭvā manyum ājagāma
GK21ttrkhy1u:468: devo 'pi viṣṇus traikālyadarśanasāmakṣyāt tasyāntargataṃ matvā svayam eva tatsakāśam agamat
GK21ttrkhy1u:470: yuktaṃ tvayā nāthena satā samudrāpasadān mamāyaṃ paribhava iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:471: jñātvā ca devaḥ parihasya samudrasyedam uvāca |
GK21ttrkhy1u:473: anyathā tvām āgneyāstrapratāpitam anekavaḍavāmukhasahasraparikṣīṇatoyaṃ sadyaḥ kariṣyāmīti
GK21ttrkhy1u:476: iti matvā praṇamya devaṃ samarpitavān iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:480: kadācid asau vanyadviparadanakoṭipāṭitavakṣā ekadeśasthaḥ kṣutkṣāmatanuḥ kṣudhā parigatān tān sacivān āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:481: kiñcid anviṣyatāṃ vane sattvajātam ! yenāham etadavastho 'pi
GK21ttrkhy1u:483: atha tadājñāsamakālam eva te 'raṇye paryaṭanto yadā na kiñcid āseduḥ ! tadāsau jambukas taṃ śaṅkukarṇanāmānaṃ karabhaṃ vivikte 'bhihitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:487: tad ahaṃ kiñcid bhavataḥ prārthaye ! yadi pratīcchasīti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:494: ahaṃ te dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ siṃhasakāśād dāpayiṣye |
GK21ttrkhy1u:495: tvayāpy evaṃ vayam ātmā ca saṃvardhitās syur iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:497: evam abhidhāya siṃhasakāśaṃ gatvā tam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:500: bṛhatprasthena dviguṇayā tulayojjāsyaṃ śarīraṃ samprayacchāmi iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:503: atha pratipanne śaṅkukarṇaḥ papāta bhūmau ! khaṇḍaśaś ca kṛtaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:504: tataś caturakas taṃ siṃhaṃ rudhiraraktasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā abravīt |
GK21ttrkhy1u:505: gacchatu svāmī snānam ācaritum ! yāvad ahaṃ kravyamukhasahitas
GK21ttrkhy1u:507: gate ca tasmiṃś caturakas taṃ kravyamukham āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:508: bhakṣaya tāvad ataḥ piśitam ! yāvad asau snātuṃ gataḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:514: tvayā punar mama mukham evāvalokitavyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:515: evam ukte tābhyāṃ kravyam atibahu bhakṣitam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:516: atrāntare siṃhas samprāpto yāvat paśyati sakalaṃ jaṭharapiśitam upabhuktam ! tataś caturakam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:518: evaṃ vadati siṃhe kravyamukho mukhaṃ caturakasyāvalokitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:523: atha siṃhaḥ kuliśakharanakaro bhrūkuṭilamukhaḥ prakaṭitaroṣas taṃ hantum aicchat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:524: athāsāv api vṛko mukhavaivarṇyavepathuvyāptatanur atanupadavikṣepaḥ kṣiprapalāyanapaṭur aṭavīm uddiśya jagāma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:526: etasmiṃś cāntare kathamapi ca tatsamīpam atha kaścit sārthavāho anena pathāyātaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:527: tasya ca sārthāgresaraṃ kaṭāhena galabaddhena karabham āgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtakaviṣādo jambukas taṃ siṃham āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:530: yāvad adyāpi piśitaṃ nopabhujyate ! tāvad bṛhatprastham ādāya
GK21ttrkhy1u:533: gacchatu svāmī digantaram anyat ! yāvad aham enaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:540: khadyotaṃ dṛṣṭvāgnir ayam ity āhāryaiś śuṣkatṛṇaparṇair ācchādya prasāritabhujaḥ kakṣakukṣivakṣaḥpradeśān kaṇḍūyamānaḥ pratāpamanorathasukhāni kilānubhavati |
GK21ttrkhy1u:541: tatraikaś śākhāmṛgas tadgatamanā muhurmuhus tam eva mukhenopādhamat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:546: athāsāv adhamat tasya tad vacanam avamanyaiva |
GK21ttrkhy1u:547: punaś ca tenāsakṛd vāryamāṇo naiva śāmyati |
GK21ttrkhy1u:548: kiṃ bahunā ! tāvat tena karṇābhāśam āgatyāgatya prabalam udvejitaḥ ! yāvat tena sahasā gṛhītvā śilāyām āvidhya vigataprāṇaḥ kṛto asāv iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:550: asti ! kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vaṇiksutau suhṛdau staḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:553: atha tatra dharmabuddhir nāmaikas sārthavāhasuto yas tena kasyacit sādhoḥ pūrvasthāpitaṃ kalaśikāgataṃ svabhāgyapracoditaṃ raupyadīnārasahasraṃ prāptam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:554: sa duṣṭabuddhinā saha sampradhārya kṛtārthāv āvāṃ svadeśaṃ gacchāva iti pratyāgatau |
GK21ttrkhy1u:559: atha duṣṭabuddhir antaḥkaṭhinahṛdayas svārthasiddhaye tam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:560: bhadra ! vittaśeṣo yāvad āvayos sāmānyaḥ ! tāvad avicchinnas snehasadbhāvaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:561: kintv ekam ekaṃ śataṃ gṛhītvā praviśāvaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:564: tathā cānuṣṭhite śeṣaṃ kutracit suguptaṃ kṛtvā praviṣṭau |
GK21ttrkhy1u:565: atha tadvarṣābhyantare duṣṭabuddhir asadvyayavyasanitvād bhāgyacchidratayā ca kṣīṇapratyaṃśaḥ punar api ca nidhito dharmabuddhinā sahāparaśataṃ vibhaktavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:568: yadi punaś śatavibhāgena vibhajāvaḥ ! tat kiṃ mayā kṛtaṃ bhavati |
GK21ttrkhy1u:570: evaṃ matvaikākī bhūtvā tām arthamātrām apanīya pradeśaṃ samīkṛtya māsātikrānte kāle dharmabuddhim abhihitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:572: pratipanne ca dharmabuddhinā saha gatvā tam evoddeśaṃ khātakarma kartum ārabdhaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:573: khanyamāne ca yadā na dṛśyate ! tadā prathamataraṃ dhṛṣṭatayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:574: duṣṭabuddhiḥ pāṣāṇenātmanaś śiro 'tāḍayad abravīc ca sasambhramam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:586: yasyaiva vṛkṣasyādhastāt sthāpitaṃ dravyam ! tenaiva vibhāvayāmi iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:587: atha te vismayam upagatāḥ ! kathaṃ vanaspatir mantrayiṣyatīti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:592: ahaṃ tu tvām adya rātrau vṛkṣavivare 'smin sthāpayāmi |
GK21ttrkhy1u:598: [ upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet |
GK21ttrkhy1u:604: asti ! kasmiṃścid arjunavṛkṣe bakadampatī prativasatas sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:605: tatra ca vṛkṣavivarānusārī mahākāyo 'hir asañjātakriyāṇy eva apatyāni bhakṣayati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:606: tena ca nirvedena naṣṭasañjñāv āhārakriyām utsṛjya jalāśayaikadeśe vimanaskāv āsāte |
GK21ttrkhy1u:608: māma ! kim adyāpy āhāro anuṣṭhīyatae iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:613: sa tu tasmai yathāvṛttam apatyabhakṣaṇam ākhyātavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:616: yeyaṃ nakulavasatir etatprabhṛtyavicchinnaparamparayā matsyapiśitaṃ prakīryatām ! yāvatsarpavasatiḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:618: tathā cānuṣṭhite nakulaiḥ piśitamārgānusāribhiḥ pūrvavairakriyām anusmaradbhiḥ khaṇḍaśo 'hiṃ kurvadbhiḥ pūrvadṛṣṭamārgam ādhāvadbhir bakāvāsaṃ gatvā bakasya
GK21ttrkhy1u:621: upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet |
GK21ttrkhy1u:622: iti bruvann api tenāsau nītvā sthāpito vṛkṣavivare |
GK21ttrkhy1u:626: tac ca śrutvā dharmabuddiś cintayām āsa |
GK21ttrkhy1u:632: adyāpy aviplutae eva loke dharmabuddir ahaṃ vijane 'smin vanae
GK21ttrkhy1u:638: punar api viṣayā labhyante ! na tu prāṇāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:642: kintv asmāt sthānād ekānte 'vasthānaṃ kurudhvam ! yāvad aham enaṃ nidhipālaṃ kṛṣṇasarpaṃ parājayāmi |
GK21ttrkhy1u:643: ity uktvāhāryaiś śuṣkadāruparṇanicayair vṛkṣavivaram āpūryāgnim ādīpayitum ārabdhaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:644: duṣṭabuddhis tv adhomukhenākṣṇā vilokya vṛkṣavivarāntargataṃ vaṇikputraṃ dṛṣṭvā vyathitamanā abhavat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:645: pradīpte ca vahnau samantata ujjvalībhūtād vṛkṣavivarāt sphaṭitatanuḥ pluṣṭakeśas srastatvag yadā jāto vaṇik ! tadā bhūmau nipatitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:646: tat tu mahad vaikārikaṃ dṛṣṭvā kim idam iti paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:647: kiñcij jīvitaṃ ca pratyakṣam abhijñāya vaṇikputraṃ papracchuḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:648: kim idam īdṛśam agnipatanam adhyavasitaṃ bhavateti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:650: anena duṣputreṇāham avasthām imāṃ prāpita iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:657: so 'nyasmin vaṇikputrake tāṃ nikṣipya deśāntaram arthopārjanāya prāyāt |
GK21ttrkhy1u:658: kṣīṇabhāgyatvāc ca tena bahunāpi kālena na kiñcid āsāditam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:659: pratyāgataś ca tāṃ tulāṃ tasmāt prārthitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:665: antarlīnam avahasyābravīt ! avaśyam etad evam ! yatkāraṇam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:666: vṛṣyaṃ svādu mṛdu ca lohaṃ katham ākhavo na bhakṣayiṣyanti ! iti pratipannavāk |
GK21ttrkhy1u:667: asāv api suparihṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ pādyādipurassarāṃ tasya pūjāṃ kartum ārabdhavān bhojane ca prārthitavān
GK21ttrkhy1u:669: tatra snānābhyudyatasya ca tasya svīyaṃ putram ekam āmalakasnānaśāṭikāsametaṃ pṛṣṭataḥ preṣitavān
GK21ttrkhy1u:670: asāv api pratyāgacchan dārakam anyasmin mitragṛhe suguptaṃ kṛtvā praviṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:671: atha bhojanasamaye sārthavāho dārakam adṛṣṭvā samākulamanāś śaṅkitahṛdayaś ca tam apṛcchat
GK21ttrkhy1u:676: tac chrutvā paramāvigno nirdayībhūtaś ca taṃ bāhau gṛhītvā dharmasthānaṃ nītavān ! āha ca
GK21ttrkhy1u:678: anena me dārakaḥ kvāpi gopita iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:688: yatra tulā lohasahasrasyāsya gehe madīyā mūṣakair bhakṣitā ! tatra kathaṃ dārakaś śyenena nāpahriyatae iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:689: tac ca śrutvā pratipāditavantas te prāḍvivākāḥ parasparasya tattulātaddārakadānam iti |
